Features - Standardized build system with reproducible builds by default - Robust environment management with support for custom scripts and UV - Configurable Python distribution management - Test execution with known best practices - Static analysis with sane defaults - Built-in Python script runner - Easy publishing to PyPI or other indices - Version management - Best practice project generation - Responsive CLI, ~2-3x faster than equivalent tools See the Why Hatch? page for more information.
